column1: '''The Hunter''' could be referring to the following:

column2: thirteenth [[Kings of Rohan|King]] of [[Rohan]] who died capturing the [[Boar of Everholt]].
female [[Chieftain of the Haladin]] during the [[First Age]].
an illusive figure of Elven legends.
a [[First Age]] [[Elves|Elf]] of [[Doriath]] who accompanied [[Beren]] in the [[Hunting of the Wolf]].
a [[Stewards of Gondor|Steward of Gondor]] who killed the [[Kine of Araw]].
